createFront(string,bool).details: Create a storefront by store owner .

params._isOpen: is the storefront available or not.

createProduct(string,string,uint256,uint.details: Create a product of storefront by store owner .

params._isOpen: is the product available or not.

getFrontAtIndex(address,uint256).details: Get a storefront information by index.
getFrontAtIndex(address,uint256).return: name The name of storefront.isOpen The status of storefront.

getProductAtIndex(address,string,uint256.details: Get a product information by index.

params._index: a index of product of storefront.

getProductAtIndex(address,string,uint256.return: name The name of product.price The price of product.quantity The quantity of product.sales The sales of product.isOpen The status of product.

getProductsCount(address,string).details: Get product count of a storefront.
getProductsCount(address,string).return: The product count of the storefront.

getStoreAtIndex(uint256).details: Get a store information by index.
getStoreAtIndex(uint256).return: owner The address of store owner.name The name of store.balance The balance of store.

getStoreDetail(address).details: Get a store information by address.
getStoreDetail(address).return: name The name of store.balance The balance of store.

withdraw(uint256).details: Store owner can withdraw his balance.

params._amount: amount of balance to be withdraw.
